sorcer.service

Interface Evaluation<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsyncExertion, Context<T>, Exertion, InclusiveContext, MonitoredExertion
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayContext, ControlContext, IfExertion, Job, ListContext, NetJob, NetTask, ObjectJob, ObjectTask, PositionalContext, ServiceContext, ServiceExertion, SharedAssociativeContext, SharedIndexedContext, SignedServiceTask, Task, WhileExertion

    public interface Evaluation<T>
    A functionality required by all evaluations in SORCER.
    Author:
    Mike Sobolewski

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T asis()
      Returns the value of the existing value of this evaluation that might be invalid.
      T getValue(Parameter... entries)
      Returns the current value of this evaluation.
      Evaluation<T> substitute(Parameter... entries)
      Realizes the substitution for this evaluation with respect to the provided parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • asis

        T asis()
       throws EvaluationException,
              RemoteException
        Returns the value of the existing value of this evaluation that might be invalid.
        Returns:
        the value as is
        Throws:
        EvaluationException
        RemoteException

      • getValue

        T getValue(Parameter... entries)
           throws EvaluationException,
                  RemoteException
        Returns the current value of this evaluation. The current value can be exiting value with no need to evaluate it if it's still valid.
        Returns:
        the current value of this evaluation
        Throws:
        EvaluationException
        RemoteException

      • substitute

        Evaluation<T> substitute(Parameter... entries)
                         throws EvaluationException,
                                RemoteException
        Realizes the substitution for this evaluation with respect to the provided parameters.
        Parameters:
        entries - substitution parameters
        Throws:
        EvaluationException
        RemoteException
